fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Be thankful for someone at night, granting them immunity to indirect roleblocks, rolestops, and redirects.
- Feed someone turkey at night, short-circuiting them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- On Night 4, your family comes over for dinner. If your faction doesn't have a factional chat or don't all win together, they now have a factional chat and all win together.
- This role can spawn in any spotlightless faction because I said so.
